entry.title: Get Ready
entry.content:
1. Please fill out this quick Google Form no later than July 9th. You’ll be working with a partner in this class and I want to make it as easy as possible for you to find a like-minded / like-located one.
  2. Re-read the syllabus to get the required books and materials. Show up to the first class ready to interview, sketch, and make lo-fi prototypes.
entry.summary: Please fill out this quick Google Form no later than July 9th. You’ll be working with a partner in this class and I want to make it as easy as possible for you to find a like-minded / like-located one. Re-read the syllabus to get the required books and materials. Show up to the first class ready to interview, sketch, and make lo-fi prototypes.
